text:
I feel they are very close and I think I see the same people moving between them. Or at least my corner of them.

For those who haven't seen it yet, my own "tool for thought" is also aiming to be a light coding notebook : <https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=H7_THeK9EBw>

And I have a couple of other experiments I'm working on, that I'm not quite ready to talk about yet, but which I hope will be interesting to future coders and will be integrated into Cardigan Bay soon.

attachments.title: Cardigan Bay 0.6.0 - Easy Installation and Getting Started
attachments.fallback: YouTube Video: Cardigan Bay 0.6.0 - Easy Installation and Getting Started
